content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at (1,1)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (1,1) with burner inserter at (1.5,2.5)
- Stone furnace at (3,1) with burner inserter at (3.5,2.5)
- Wooden chests at (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) storing iron plates
- Additional wooden chest at (5.5,3.5) with burner inserter at (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line at (2,7)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (2,7) with burner inserter at (2.5,8.5)
- Stone furnace at (4,7) with burner inserter at (4.5,8.5)
- Wooden chests at (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System at (2.5,35.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles connecting various facilities

### Research Lab
- Single lab connected to power network (no specific coordinates provided)

### Unused Pump
- Offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) not connected to any system

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting automation science packs
- Cannot craft automation science packs without first having the ability to craft iron gear wheels
- Need to set up assembling machines for intermediate products before attempting to craft complex items
- Ensure all prerequisite recipes and materials are available before attempting crafting

### Errors related to placing assembling machines
- Cannot place assembling machine without first having it in inventory
- Need to craft or acquire assembling machines before attempting to place them
- Verify inventory contents before attempting to place entities

### Power system issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine
- Boiler shows "out of fuel" warning - need to supply fuel (coal) to boiler for power generation
